issue.title: Intermittent issue in feature_assumeutxo.py", line 629, in run_test                                        assert not self.has_blockfile(n1, "00002"), "too many blockfiles"
issue.body:
Seen locally in https://drahtbot.space/temp_scratch/feature_assumeutxo_265.tar.zstd:

commit should be roughly 40e7d4cd0d7f1d922b92b0c640d3d89eef059411 and the command was `RUN_UNIT_TESTS=false MAKEJOBS="-j8" FILE_ENV="./ci/test/00_setup_env_native_nowallet_libbitcoinkernel.sh" ./ci/test_run_all.sh`

```
 node1 2025-10-15T18:56:48.763939Z [shutoff] [txdb.cpp:151] [virtual bool CCoinsViewDB::BatchWrite(CoinsViewCacheCursor &, const uint256 &)] [coindb] Writing final batch of 0.00 MiB
